tweets.text: True wealth looks different than you think.

We need 1-2 interest rate cuts and a few trade deals announced for the Wall Street folks to get amnesia and forget they were in a full panic just a few weeks ago. Stonks only go up, baby! DOPAMINE: THE INVISIBLE ENEMY OF YOUR FREEDOM
(1) Dopamine.
Invisible, yet omnipresent.
It controls our lives, our choices, our failures.
Understanding dopamine might be the first true freedom. Printers go brrrr, markets go - that's the vibes we need. Rate cuts are coming!! It’s coming Interest rates should drop, calm market chaos yep kinda already happening. the end of the markets doom squad already has pie on their face. In financial markets, narrative decay half-life is faster than economic cycles. Cuts and deals are just the memory wipe button. wen rate cuts Inflation is falling, we may see cuts soon Markets recovered quickly It’s been weeks. Not a single trade deal. Not one. It's wild how quickly sentiment can flip from doom to euphoria based on just a few Fed decisions and headlines. Bullshit this fkr is toast.. reps on the line.. i think we are close Exactly, but it looks like we'll have to wait for the June Fed meeting for next rate cut. Nailed it!! Wall Street needs rate cuts to forget panic? Please. A green candle on Bitcoin does the same for the degens. Market memory is measured in minutes, apparently. Just hold the index, ignore the noise. That would be glorious Can you please share the rational why interest rates would not cause further inflation? Knowing tariffs are not done and we don’t have enough data of a probable impact.

There are two types of people in the world — those who are cheering for others to succeed and those who are not.

We need as many people in the first group as we can get. Keep cheering and working on till your turn Certification Trend Micro MSP édition 2025

Gérez efficacement le cycle de vie complet de la sécurité de vos clients :

Avant, pendant et après l'intrusion cheer them on and fund them if possible Abundance mindset > scarcity mindset. Always. success isn't zero sum. more wins, more possibilities for everyone I'm cheering for everyone who is building something revolutionary. Unfortunately, many people develop envy. Some people see others winning and think, "me too."

Others see it and think, "why not me?"

Guess which group builds empires. We need to become the first kind. Surround yourself with people who genuinely want to see you win. Imagine what we could build if so much of the world wasn’t fixated on just tearing things (and people) down. A world of builders needs builders of builders. Just like there are two types of assets — Bitcoin, which empowers and grows with the people, and everything else that doesn’t. We need more Bitcoin believers, just like we need more people cheering for others to succeed. Agree yeah life’s way better when we’re rooting for each other :) Those who cheer for others reveal a heart abundant enough to see life as collaboration, not competition. 

In a world starved for genuine encouragement, be the rare soul who multiplies light instead of hoarding it. Totally

The hysteria in financial markets has been completely overblown.

I have been saying this for weeks and now it is proving true.

Stocks up. Bitcoin up. Jobs up. 

Inflation down. 

Critics in disbelief. They backed off the policies that were causing the problems. They are still implementing tariffs and their economic policies. If they are bad, then asset prices should be down but just down less. Inflation should be up, but just up less.

The exact opposite has happened. Stocks are up since the close of Liberation Day. You have almost 2 million subscribers but you say such crazy things...

I'd be ashamed if I were you lol. Yup, a classic tell tale of how fear sells faster than facts.

But if you're going to look at the fundamentas, nothing has changed much. We're geared up for better things ahead. This week might get crazy Imports falling off a cliff, China to USA.  Small / medium-sized companies are in big trouble if Chinese tariff remains. You're going to be in disbelief in about 3 months. Told ya so! Markets love a good recovery story. 

Pomp’s right—hysteria’s been overblown. 

Stocks and Bitcoin are flexing their muscles. 

Jobs are up and inflation’s cooling. 

Critics? Just noise. Thanks to you and we have all known the headlines of tomorrow’s newspaper for 2 months! no one seriously thought it was the end of the world then did they? Every panic creates a buyer’s market.

Panic never pays. Patience does. Easier to say things will fail/go down, than believe/ they will go up! Hysteria goes both ways
